answers.answer: Maybe your next appointment your doc will send you do have it done , i just took mine @ 24 weeks
I think it all depends cuz most ppl in ma fam have diabetes so i had to take the glucose test at 12wks.
I have mines next Thursday.  Ill be 25weeks almost 26.
I'm hypoglycemic so they tested me at week 7. They said I will test again in week 25 when most people have theirs done.  It may be a doctor preference too.

question: When do you usually go in for the glucose testing? I am 21 weeks and just wondering when I should be expecting this.
title: testing
